headline: Assurant Ventures Invests in Automotive Ventures’ Mobility Fund II
summary: ATLANTA, March 12, 2025--Assurant Ventures, the venture capital investment arm of Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced an investment in Automotive Ventures’ Mobility Fund II. The fund focuses on identifying and supporting innovative early-stage startups across the mobility ecosystem and will enable Assurant Global Automotive to better su
